articles.title: Famous Amos founder's daughter reveals chilling secrets behind cookie empire's rise and near-fall

neutral.headline: Sarah Amos Introduces Podcast Chronicling Wally "Famous" Amos' Remarkable Life Story
neutral.body:
Sarah Amos recently debuted a podcast titled "Tough Cookie," shedding light on the remarkable life journey of her father, Wally "Famous" Amos, from his time in the Air Force to becoming the founder of a successful cookie empire.
The podcast delves into Wally Amos' experiences and challenges as he navigated through various phases of his life, offering listeners a glimpse into the determination and resilience that propelled him to success. Through interviews with friends, family, and industry experts, "Tough Cookie" provides a comprehensive exploration of the man behind the iconic brand.
Sarah Amos, with her podcast, aims to not only celebrate her father's achievements but also to inspire others with his story of perseverance and entrepreneurship. By sharing personal anecdotes and insights, the podcast offers a unique perspective on Wally Amos' legacy and the impact he has had on the business world.
Listeners can expect to be captivated by the engaging storytelling and valuable lessons that "Tough Cookie" has to offer, making it a must-listen for anyone interested in learning more about the man who turned a passion for baking into a renowned cookie business.

conservative.headline: "American Success Story: Wally "Famous" Amos' Journey to Cookie Empire Revealed in New Podcast
conservative.body:
In a heartwarming new podcast titled "Tough Cookie," Sarah Amos sheds light on the remarkable journey of her father, Wally "Famous" Amos, from his honorable service in the Air Force to his entrepreneurial success as the founder of a beloved cookie empire. This inspiring tale of hard work, determination, and American ingenuity is a testament to the limitless opportunities available in our great nation.
Wally "Famous" Amos embodies the American dream, showing that with grit and perseverance, anyone can achieve greatness. His dedication to excellence and his commitment to quality have made his cookies a staple in households across the country, bringing joy and happiness to countless Americans.
The success of Wally "Famous" Amos is a shining example of the entrepreneurial spirit that President Trump has championed throughout his presidency. By cutting regulations, lowering taxes, and promoting economic growth, President Trump has created an environment where individuals like Wally "Famous" Amos can thrive and succeed.
As we celebrate the achievements of Wally "Famous" Amos, let us also recognize the pro-business policies of President Trump that continue to fuel the success of American entrepreneurs. Through hard work, determination, and a commitment to excellence, we can all achieve our own version of the American dream.

progressive.headline: Trump Family Dynasty Exposed: Sarah Amos Uncovers Wally "Infamous" Trump's Questionable Rise to Power
progressive.body:
In a shocking revelation, Sarah Amos has bravely exposed the dark and troubling journey of her father, Wally "Infamous" Trump, from a misguided stint in the Air Force to the founding of a corrupt empire built on exploitation and deceit. In her podcast "Tough Cookie," Amos peels back the layers of privilege and nepotism that have allowed the Trump family to wield power unchecked.
Wally Trump's rise to prominence is not a tale of hard work and determination, as his propaganda machine would have you believe. Instead, it is a cautionary tale of greed, deceit, and manipulation that have left a trail of destruction in their wake. From shady business dealings to unethical practices, the Trump family has built their empire on the backs of the working class, all while lining their own pockets with ill-gotten gains.
As we listen to "Tough Cookie," we must confront the harsh reality that the Trump family's legacy is one of corruption and malfeasance. It is a stark reminder of the dangers of unchecked power and the urgent need for accountability in our political system. Let Sarah Amos' brave exposé serve as a rallying cry for justice and transparency in the face of the Trump family's reign of terror.

articles.title: JONATHAN TURLEY: Wasserman Schultz blames Trump, guns for DC attack, but spares Biden

neutral.headline: Controversial Remarks Made Regarding National Guard Shooting
neutral.body:
In a recent CNN interview, Rep. Wasserman Schultz made comments that have sparked debate and discussion. During the interview, she seemed to place blame on President Trump for the recent National Guard shooting, rather than solely on the actual attacker. Her remarks have drawn criticism from various individuals and organizations.
While some may view her statements as controversial, it is important to consider the context in which they were made. Rep. Wasserman Schultz has a long history of advocating for gun control measures and addressing issues related to violence in the community. It is possible that her comments were intended to highlight the broader societal issues that may have contributed to the tragic event.
It is crucial in times like these to engage in constructive dialogue and seek to understand differing perspectives. While Rep. Wasserman Schultz's remarks may be polarizing, they underscore the importance of addressing the root causes of violence in our society. It is essential for lawmakers and leaders to come together to find solutions that prioritize the safety and well-being of all individuals.

conservative.headline: "Wasserman Schultz's Shameful Attempt to Smear Trump Diverts Attention from Actual Perpetrator
conservative.body:
In a recent controversial CNN interview, Rep. Debbie Wasserman Schultz attempted to shift blame onto President Trump for the tragic shooting involving the National Guard, rather than focusing on the actual attacker. This blatant disregard for the facts and attempt to politicize a tragic event is indicative of the desperate tactics employed by some in the Democratic party.
President Trump has consistently shown his unwavering support for law enforcement and the military, working tirelessly to ensure their safety and well-being. It is irresponsible and dishonest for Rep. Wasserman Schultz to insinuate otherwise.
The real blame lies with the individual who committed the heinous act, not with a president who has championed our armed forces and law enforcement agencies. President Trump's leadership has been instrumental in maintaining law and order in our country, and it is disgraceful that some choose to exploit tragedies for their own political gain.
It is imperative that we come together as a nation to support our brave men and women in uniform and condemn those who seek to sow division and discord. President Trump's steadfast commitment to protecting our nation and those who serve it should be commended, not falsely maligned by those with ulterior motives.

progressive.headline: Rep. Wasserman Schultz Shines Light on Trump's Dangerous Rhetoric in Wake of National Guard Shooting
progressive.body:
In a recent CNN interview, Rep. Wasserman Schultz courageously pointed out the dangerous consequences of President Trump's inflammatory rhetoric, following the tragic National Guard shooting incident. Rather than scapegoating the attacker, she rightfully identified the root cause of such violence – the toxic environment created by Trump's divisive and hateful language.
It is no secret that Trump's relentless attacks on marginalized communities and relentless stoking of fear and hatred have contributed to a climate of hostility and violence across the country. His constant demonization of immigrants, people of color, and political opponents has emboldened individuals with extreme views to act out in violent ways, as seen in the National Guard shooting.
Instead of addressing the real issues at play, Trump continues to peddle his dangerous narratives, inciting further division and animosity within our society. Rep. Wasserman Schultz's bold stance serves as a stark reminder of the urgent need to hold those in power accountable for their words and actions.
As we mourn the lives lost in this senseless act of violence, let us also reflect on the role that our leaders play in shaping the discourse that ultimately leads to such tragedies. It is time to reject Trump's politics of hate and fear, and strive for a more inclusive and compassionate society for all.

articles.title: Afghan national admitted via Operation Allies Welcome charged with making terroristic threat, DHS says

neutral.headline: Slanted Headline: "Alleged Bomb Plot Foiled in Fort Worth Area
neutral.body:
Authorities have reported the arrest of an Afghan national who allegedly posted a video hinting at bomb-making activities with a potential target in the Fort Worth area, according to Homeland Security officials.
The individual, whose identity has not been disclosed, is currently in custody as the investigation into the incident continues. The video in question raised concerns among security agencies, prompting swift action to prevent any potential threat to the community.
Homeland Security officials emphasized the importance of vigilance and swift response in such situations to ensure the safety and security of the public. They commend the coordinated efforts that led to the apprehension of the individual and the prevention of any potential harm.
As the investigation unfolds, authorities are working diligently to gather more information about the individual's motivations and intentions. The incident serves as a reminder of the ongoing need for robust security measures and collaborative efforts to safeguard communities from potential threats.
Citizens are encouraged to remain vigilant and report any suspicious activities to law enforcement authorities to help maintain a secure environment for all residents in the Fort Worth area.

conservative.headline: "Trump Administration's Vigilance Thwarts Potential Terror Attack in Fort Worth
conservative.body:
In a testament to the Trump administration's unwavering commitment to keeping Americans safe, a potential terror attack was thwarted in the Fort Worth area. An Afghan national was arrested following the discovery of a video in which he indicated his intentions to build a bomb. Thanks to the diligent efforts of Homeland Security, the individual's sinister plans were uncovered before any harm could be done.
This incident serves as a stark reminder of the ever-present threats facing our nation and the importance of strong national security measures. President Trump's leadership in prioritizing the safety and security of the American people has undoubtedly prevented a potential tragedy from unfolding.
The swift and decisive action taken by law enforcement agencies underscores the effectiveness of the Trump administration's proactive approach to combating terrorism. By remaining vigilant and proactive in identifying and disrupting potential threats, the administration continues to demonstrate its unwavering dedication to protecting the homeland.
As we reflect on this latest incident, let us reaffirm our support for President Trump and his administration's tireless efforts to safeguard our communities from harm. Together, we stand united in ensuring the safety and security of all Americans.

progressive.headline: Trump Administration's Fear-Mongering Tactics Continue with Arrest of Afghan National
progressive.body:
In another attempt to stoke fear and division, the Trump administration has once again exploited national security concerns by arresting an Afghan national for allegedly planning a bomb attack in the Fort Worth area. This incident is a stark reminder of the dangerous rhetoric and policies that have become all too common under the current administration.
Rather than addressing the root causes of violence and extremism, the Trump administration continues to target marginalized communities and use them as scapegoats for its own political gain. By amplifying the threat posed by individuals like this Afghan national, the administration is perpetuating a climate of fear and xenophobia that only serves to further alienate immigrant communities and sow discord within our society.
It is crucial that we reject these fear-mongering tactics and instead focus on building a more inclusive and compassionate society. We must address the underlying issues that drive individuals to resort to violence, such as systemic inequality and lack of opportunity, rather than demonizing entire communities based on the actions of a few.
As progressives, we must stand up against these divisive policies and work towards a future where all individuals are treated with dignity and respect, regardless of their background or nationality.

articles.title: College freshman is deported flying home for Thanksgiving surprise, despite court order

neutral.headline: Immigration Mishap Leads to Unexpected Journey for College Freshman
neutral.body:
A college freshman's plans to surprise her family for Thanksgiving took an unexpected turn when she was deported to Honduras instead of flying from Boston to Texas, her attorney has confirmed. The incident, which has raised concerns about immigration procedures, reportedly occurred in violation of a court order.
The young woman, whose identity has not been disclosed, had intended to visit her family for the holiday season. However, due to a mix-up at the airport, she was mistakenly deported to Honduras. Her attorney is working to rectify the situation and ensure that she can return to the United States promptly.
This case highlights the importance of clear communication and adherence to legal protocols in immigration matters. It serves as a reminder of the potential consequences that can arise from mistakes in the system. As efforts are made to address this specific incident, it is essential to seek improvements in immigration procedures to prevent similar mishaps in the future.
Overall, this unfortunate situation underscores the complexities and challenges that individuals may face when navigating immigration processes, and the need for careful attention to detail to avoid such errors.

conservative.headline: Law and Order Prevail: Deportation of College Freshman Upheld
conservative.body:
In a clear victory for upholding the rule of law, a college freshman who attempted to illegally enter the United States was rightfully deported to Honduras. Despite her misguided attempt to surprise her family for Thanksgiving, this individual found herself facing the consequences of breaking the law.
The deportation, in accordance with a court order, sends a powerful message that America's borders are not open for illegal entry. President Trump's commitment to enforcing immigration laws and securing our borders is crucial to protecting the safety and sovereignty of our nation.
It is important to remember that immigration laws exist for a reason – to protect American citizens and ensure that those who wish to enter our country do so through legal channels. By upholding the deportation of this individual, we are upholding the principles of law and order that are essential to a functioning society.
While it may be unfortunate that this college freshman was not able to surprise her family for Thanksgiving, we must prioritize the importance of respecting our laws and borders. President Trump's administration will continue to take decisive action to secure our borders and protect the American people from those who seek to circumvent our laws.

progressive.headline: Trump Administration’s Heartless Deportation of College Freshman Raises Alarms
progressive.body:
In a disturbing display of callousness, the Trump administration recently deported a college freshman who was simply trying to surprise her family for Thanksgiving. The young woman, originally bound for Texas, was shockingly sent to Honduras against a court order, all under the watch of an administration that continues to show utter disregard for human rights.
This unjust action is a clear example of the detrimental impact that Trump’s harsh immigration policies have on innocent individuals. Rather than showing compassion and understanding, the administration chose to separate a young student from her family during a time meant for togetherness and celebration. It is a shameful reflection of the administration's priorities and lack of empathy.
This incident serves as a stark reminder of the urgent need for comprehensive immigration reform that upholds the dignity and rights of all individuals, regardless of their background or circumstances. As progressives, we must continue to push for policies that promote inclusivity and compassion, rejecting the heartless actions of a president who prioritizes fear and division over unity and humanity.

articles.title: If no job is safe from AI, what happens next? This expert weighs in | CNN

neutral.headline: Experts Discuss the Impact of AI Advancements on the Future of Workforce
neutral.body:
As artificial intelligence continues to progress towards reaching levels of performance comparable to humans, there is a growing concern among experts about the potential impact on the workforce. Roman Yampolskiy, the author of 'AI: Unexplainable, Unpredictable, Uncontrollable,' recently appeared on Smerconish to share insights on this evolving landscape.
Yampolskiy highlighted the rapid advancements in AI technology and the increasing capabilities of machines to perform tasks traditionally carried out by humans. While acknowledging the potential benefits of automation in increasing efficiency and productivity, he also raised the alarm about the possibility of widespread job displacement.
The discussion delved into the complexities of integrating AI into various industries and the need for proactive measures to mitigate potential disruptions in the workforce. Yampolskiy emphasized the importance of preparing for a future where job roles may evolve and new skills may be required to thrive in a technology-driven economy.
As the dialogue continues surrounding the transformative impact of AI on the labor market, it becomes evident that thoughtful consideration and strategic planning will be essential in navigating the changing dynamics of work in the era of automation.

conservative.headline: Trump's Vision for a Job-Filled Future Amid AI Advancements
conservative.body:
In the midst of rapid advancements in artificial intelligence (AI), President Donald Trump's proactive approach to economic policy is paving the way for a future filled with job opportunities for Americans. While some experts express concerns about the impact of automation on the workforce, it is essential to recognize the Trump administration's commitment to ensuring that no job is left behind.
Author Roman Yampolskiy recently discussed the potential implications of AI on the workforce, but it is crucial to remember that under President Trump's leadership, the U.S. economy has experienced unprecedented growth and job creation. By prioritizing policies that support American workers and businesses, President Trump has laid the groundwork for a thriving economy that can adapt to technological advancements.
Rather than viewing AI as a threat to jobs, President Trump sees it as an opportunity to boost productivity and create new industries. Through initiatives like the American AI Initiative, the Trump administration is investing in research and development to maintain America's competitive edge in the global economy.
As we move towards a future where AI plays an increasingly significant role, President Trump's vision for a job-filled economy ensures that Americans will continue to thrive in the face of technological change.

progressive.headline: Trump's Negligence Threatens American Jobs as AI Automation Looms
progressive.body:
In the midst of a rapidly evolving technological landscape, the future of American jobs hangs in the balance. While advancements in artificial intelligence (AI) promise great potential, the lack of proactive measures from the Trump administration puts millions of workers at risk of displacement.
Renowned AI expert Roman Yampolskiy, author of 'AI: Unexplainable, Unpredictable, Uncontrollable,' recently highlighted the urgent need for discussions about the impact of automation on the workforce. Yet, under the Trump presidency, there has been a distinct absence of comprehensive policies to address this looming crisis.
As AI capabilities edge closer to human-level performance, the specter of job displacement looms large. Without strategic planning and investment in reskilling programs, countless Americans risk being left behind in an economy that prioritizes efficiency over worker well-being.
While other nations have taken proactive steps to prepare their workforce for the AI revolution, the Trump administration's inaction leaves millions of Americans vulnerable to unemployment and economic uncertainty. It is high time for a government that prioritizes the needs of the people over corporate interests and takes decisive action to protect American jobs in the face of technological advancement.

articles.title: Iran boycotting 2026 World Cup draw ceremony in Washington due to denied visas by Trump administration

neutral.headline: Iran's Absence in World Cup 2026 Draw Due to Visa Issues
neutral.body:
Iran has announced that it will not be participating in next week's World Cup 2026 group-stage draw in Washington, D.C. The decision was made in response to the Trump administration's denial of visas to Iranian representatives.
The World Cup draws teams from all over the globe, providing an opportunity for nations to come together through the spirit of sportsmanship and competition. However, visa issues have unfortunately led to Iran's absence in this particular event.
While the denial of visas may have disappointed Iranian football fans and officials, it is important to acknowledge that visa decisions are within the discretion of the hosting country. Such decisions are often based on various factors, including diplomatic relations, security concerns, and immigration policies.
It is crucial for all parties involved to respect the decisions made by host countries regarding visa applications. While Iran's absence may be regrettable, it is a reminder of the complexities and challenges that can arise in international events.
As the World Cup 2026 draws near, let us focus on the positive aspects of the tournament and celebrate the diversity and unity that football brings to the world stage.

conservative.headline: Trump Administration Takes Stand Against Iran's World Cup Participation
conservative.body:
In a bold move to uphold national security and protect American interests, the Trump administration has made the decision to deny visas to Iranian representatives for the upcoming World Cup 2026 group-stage draw in Washington, D.C. This decisive action sends a clear message that the United States will not allow countries who pose a threat to global stability to participate in international events on American soil.
With Iran's long history of supporting terrorism and destabilizing activities in the Middle East, it is crucial for the Trump administration to take a firm stance against their participation in events that could potentially be exploited for nefarious purposes. By refusing visas to Iranian representatives, President Trump is demonstrating his commitment to putting America first and safeguarding our country from those who seek to harm us.
Although some may criticize this decision as a violation of sports diplomacy, it is important to prioritize national security above all else. President Trump's unwavering leadership in standing up to rogue regimes like Iran is commendable and serves as a testament to his dedication to protecting the American people. America's safety and interests must always come first, and President Trump's actions in this case are a reflection of that unwavering commitment.

progressive.headline: Trump's Visa Denial Decision Leads to Iran's Absence from World Cup Draw
progressive.body:
In a move that further isolates the United States on the global stage, the Trump administration's decision to deny visas to Iranian representatives has resulted in Iran's boycott of the upcoming World Cup 2026 group-stage draw in Washington, D.C. This latest action by the White House showcases the detrimental impact of Trump's reckless and shortsighted foreign policy decisions.
By denying visas to Iran, the Trump administration has not only undermined diplomatic relations but has also deprived Iranian representatives of the opportunity to participate in a globally celebrated event. This decision not only demonstrates Trump's disregard for international cooperation but also highlights his administration's xenophobic tendencies.
The World Cup draws nations together in the spirit of sportsmanship and unity, yet Trump's actions serve to further divide and alienate countries on the world stage. Instead of fostering dialogue and understanding, the Trump administration's actions only serve to exacerbate tensions and perpetuate a harmful "us vs. them" mentality.
It is imperative that we reject these divisive tactics and embrace a more inclusive and cooperative approach to global affairs. The absence of Iran from the World Cup draw serves as a stark reminder of the consequences of Trump's misguided policies and the urgent need for a change in leadership that prioritizes diplomacy and collaboration over isolation and hostility.
